name: DDC Enterprise Limited
description: DDC Enterprise Ltd is a content driven consumer brand offering easy, convenient ready-to-heat , ready-to-cook and plant-based meal products i.e. meal products consisting largely or solely of vegetables, fruits, grains and other foods derived from plant-based protein, rather than animal protein) while promoting healthier lifestyle choices to Millennial and Generation Z customer-base. It is also engaged in the provision of advertising services and the operation of experience stores to offer cooking classes.
one_liner: DDC Enterprise Ltd is a content driven consumer brand offering easy, convenient ready-to-heat , ready-to-cook and plant-based meal products i.e. meal products consisting largely or solely of vegetables, fruits, grains and other foods derived from plant-based protein, rather than animal protein) while promoting healthier lifestyle choices to Millennial and Generation Z customer-base. It is also engaged in the provision of advertising services and the operation of experience stores to offer cooking classes.
